text: James Joseph MundayMUNDAY JAMES JOSEPH (1 November 1917 – 27 July 1971) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Geelong in the VFL. Munday won the 1944 Carji Greeves Medal for Geelong's best and fairest player, in his debut season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1917 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Geelong Football Club players Category:Carji Greeves Medal winners Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Coburg Football Club players
title: Jim Munday
